constituent: shadow, scenery, sun, day, capital, tall, top hat, mouth, small, little, shape
koohiiStory1: The sun over the capital cast a shadow with the same shape.
koohiiStory2: You're out hiking looking at the SCENERY, suddenly out of the corner of your vision you see a large SHADOW's indistinct SHAPE... could it be a grizzly? (cmp shade (#1592)).
